name: QuotesbyEdgarAllanPoe
0:
”Alexa, open Total Request Poe”
”Alexa, start Total Request Poe”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: total request poe
des:
Feeling glum, start your day with an "inspirational" quote from Edgar Allan Poe. No one captures melancholy quite like this poet. Whether your goal is to simply stir the feelings of sadness or to say "Nevermore" to those pesky happy thoughts, Poe's creative genius is a tool to do either. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
